name: Odysseon
description:
Odysseon is an RPG where all of the graphical assets are built from Ganbreeder image generations.  Explore a dreary world populated by strange people and creatures conjured up by AI neural networks, pieced together alongside a soundtrack of long forgotten vintage production music.

Odysseon is a work in progress game, and I dabble in a lot of other projects in my spare time so please be patient. You can follow me on twitter for live updates at 

https://twitter.com/HawtKoffee

CONTROLS

Odysseon uses standard RPG maker controls as well as some other additional options.

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z and X for Accept and Cancel
  • ESC for menu
  • F5 to toggle Fullscreen and Windowed
  • F6 to change window scale

CONTENT

Odysseon contains mature themes and imagery and is not intended for younger audiences, please play at your own discretion.

  • Use and references of Drugs
  • Mild blood
  • Fantasy Violence
  • Strong Language

Along with this, there are also animations with screen flashing. Players with photo sensitivity should play at their own discretion.

FAQ

  1. Is this game free? - Yes, Odysseon is a free game, there are no plans to monetize this game. Odysseon uses public domain graphical assets and is itself a public domain game.
  2. Can I stream this game? - Odysseon samples many songs from old vintage production libraries, as well as remixed music samples. Some of these songs are known to be picked up by Content ID so stream at your own risk. If you do stream or "lets play" this game, please leave a link to your recording in the comments, I'd love to see it.
  3. How long is this game? - The current build of Odysseon has a play time of roughly 1 & 1/2 hours.
  4. Is this a good speed game? - Odysseon is a very dialogue heavy game, with a focus on unique character conversations. Much of its content is woven into the game's narrative and world building. I'm not sure if this would be a very interesting game to speedrun but more power to you.
  5. I found a bug/typo! - Please leave it in a comment and I will see that it is fixed.

Pleas let me know what you think in the comments below.
